steps.text: Wash cranberries and discard any soft or wrinkled ones.
Combine orange juice, cranberry juice, and honey in a 2 quart saucepan over medium-high heat.
Bring the juice mixture to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 5 minutes.
Add the cranberries and cook for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until cranberries burst and mixture thickens. Do not cook longer than 15 minutes, as pectic will break down.
Remove from heat and cool for 5 minutes.
Spoon into a mold and refrigerate at least 6 hours to overnight.
